contentList.content: Hailing from a divine bloodline, these beings have abilities beyond those of their mundane kin.
Teleport to an unoccupied space that you can see.
Until the end of your turn, you can recast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DimensionStep">Dimension Step</LSTag> once more for free.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1], your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">jump</LSTag> distance increases by [2], and your carrying capacity is increased by a half.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
